#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
std::map <string , int> m;
std::map <string , int> ::iterator pos;
int main()
{
    int n,i;
    cin>>n;
    string s;
    int level = 1;
    for (i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        cin >> s;
        m[s]++;
        if(m[s] == level){
            cout << level<<" "<<s<<endl;
            level++;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
